author: addaleax
message:
src: fix NODE_OPTIONS parsing bug

I, uhm, might have messed up by using a `substr(start, end)`
signature when `std::string` actually uses `substr(start, len)`.
Fix that.

Fixes: https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/22526
